snippet.title: Satan's Playground! From Rhythm Retro on Google Play and Amazon  Store!  https://www.soulzilla.ca
snippet.description:
A brand new style of online tap rhythm game with RPG class upgrade system, enter name screen with swear filter, local and online hi-scores, 20 songs with 6 gameplay modes(Normal, Reversed, Hyper, Hyper-Reversed, Ultra and Ultra-Reversed), 14 crazy note and button themes and an in-game store to unlock all the content!

The free version utilizes Ads to generate Retro Bucks for the store and the full version pays you every time you beat a level!

This game is made to be fun offline or online.  It has an online top 60 leaderboard for every level. As well as a local top 3 scores for yourself.  You can mix and match button themes and the 6 gameplay modes are 3 different speeds with a note-flip for each. This creates 120 unique challenges!  There's also Gold Medals for 3 star achievements on every song.

Featured in Toronto Star Newspaper and Peterborough Examiner!
